DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy Seroquel XR schizophrenia patient acute worsen symptom . Consequently , ass whether study drug safe acceptable daily dose basis , orally give , 600 mg day 42 day .
DOC.criteria: Patient meet DSMIV criterion schizophrenia Patient PANSS total score ≥ 70 baseline Patient CGIS score ≥ 4 ( moderately ill ) baseline Patient healthy basis physical examination vital sign baseline Positive urine drug screen Opiates , amphetamine , barbiturate , cocaine , cannabis , ecstasy abuse Has history neuroleptic malignant syndrome , seropositive antiHIV , hepatitis B C virus antigen Patient unstable inadequately treat Diabetes Mellitus Use potent cytochrome P450 inhibitor inducer within 14 day baseline
